ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: so that by it We might bring forth grains and plants
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That We may produce from it grain and vegetation,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: so that We may thereby bring forth grain and vegetation,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In order to produce grain and plants with it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That We may produce therewith grains and vegetations,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: That We may bring forth thereby corn and herbs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: that We may bring forth thereby grain and plants,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thereby to produce grain and plant,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: so that We may bring forth thereby grain and a variety of plants,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So that We bring forth thereby corn and vegetation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: that We may bring forth with it grains and plants,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That We may produce therewith corn and vegetables,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That We may produce therewith corn and vegetations,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: that We may bring forth with it grain, plants
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: To produce with it grains and vegetation?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:15] that with it We may bring forth grains, such as wheat, and plants, such as figs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Thereby to produce grain and plant) to produce through the rain all kinds of grains and plants,
